---
title: "Previous editions"
---

Known as Discrete Mathematics Days since 2016, this conference inherits the tradition of the Jornadas de Matemática Discreta y Algorítmica (JMDA), the Spanish biennial meeting on Discrete Mathematics started in 1998.

## Previous editions of the Discrete Mathematics Days

- [Alcalá de Henares](https://dmd2024.web.uah.es), 3-5 July, 2024
- [Santander](https://dmd2022.unican.es/), 4-6 July, 2022 (postponed from 2020).
- [Seville](https://web.archive.org/web/20190417002813/http://congreso.us.es/dmd2018/), 27-29 June, 2018.
- [Barcelona](https://web.archive.org/web/20170504215505/http://discretemath.upc.edu/jmda16/), 6-8 July, 2016.

## Previous editions of the Jornadas de Matemática Discreta y Algorítmica (JMDA)

- [Tarragona](https://web.archive.org/web/20170504215505/http://deim.urv.cat/%7Ediscrete-math/JMDA2014/) (2014).
- [Almerí­a](https://web.archive.org/web/20170504215505/http://www.ual.es/Congresos/JMDA2012/) (2012).
- [Castro Urdiales](https://web.archive.org/web/20170504215505/http://www.jmda2010.unican.es/), Cantabria (2010).
- [Lleida](https://web.archive.org/web/20170504215505/http://www.jmda2008.udl.cat/) (2008).
- Soria (2006).
- [Cercedilla](https://web.archive.org/web/20170504215505/http://www3.uah.es/jmda/), Madrid (2004).
- Mairena del Aljarafe, Sevilla (2002).
- Palma de Mallorca (2000).
- Barcelona (1998).
